title.narrative: 4 A & B - Increased understanding on the impact of terrorism on youth

description.narrative:
Research report based on primary data, using two-staged approach (qualitative data through interviews with youth leaders, findings tested and confirmed through questionnaires.
Remark: In September 2019, the Embassy accepted a proposal from ICCT-UNICRI to widen the scope so that it would also take into account criminal groups other than terrorist organizations as this had been raised by several beneficiaries of the project. The Embassy underlined that the research should still take into account nuances/differences when dealing specifically with terrorist organizations such as the religious/ideological component.

title.narrative: 4 A & B - Increased understanding on the impact of terrorism on youth

description.narrative:
Research report based on primary data, using two-staged approach (qualitative data through interviews with youth leaders, findings tested and confirmed through questionnaires.
Remark: In September 2019, the Embassy accepted a proposal from ICCT-UNICRI to widen the scope so that it would also take into account criminal groups other than terrorist organizations as this had been raised by several beneficiaries of the project. The Embassy underlined that the research should still take into account nuances/differences when dealing specifically with terrorist organizations such as the religious/ideological component.

comment.narrative: Limited knowledge on impact of violent extremist groups on youth in north and central parts of the country (literature review).
